create_admin_account.title: Create Admin Account
create_admin_account.description: We’ll start by adding your admin account. It will be used to manage this instance.

verify_email.title: Check your E-Mail
verify_email.description: We’ve send you a magic link to {email}

success.title: Good job!
success.hint: Next step is setting up a tenant to collect appointments

error.title: Verification failed
error.description: The magic link you’ve tried is incorrect or outdated

setupPasskey.title: Setup Passkey
setupPasskey.description: Create your passkey to secure your account.
setupPasskey.success: Passkey set. Login with it now.
setupPasskey.confirmPrfRetrival: Now use your newly created passkey to enable encryption with it.
setupPasskey.errorKeyPairDataMissing: Could not generate key pair. Missing data.
setupPasskey.errorKeyPairNotSaved: Key pair could not be saved.
setupPasskey.errorPrfOutputNotTriggered: You have to confirm using the passkey.
setupPasskey.errorAuthenticatorNotSupported: This authenticator does not support the required security extension (PRF). Please use a modern authenticator like YubiKey 5.2.3+, Apple Touch ID or Android.
setupPasskey.errorGettingPrfOutput: Failed to retrieve security data from passkey. Please use a modern authenticator that supports PRF extension.

logo: OpenReception Logo: A 3D pixel art with calendar that's also a lock

errors.passphrase: Must be at least 30 characters long
errors.noPassAtAll: Either passphrase or passkey is required
errors.bothPassSet: Only one of passphrase or passkey should be provided
errors.name: Must be at least 2 characters
errors.endDateBeforeStartDate: End date must be after start date
errors.endDateTooEarly: End date must be in the future

form.noPassAtAll: Either passphrase or passkey is required
form.name: Name
form.pinHint: Save your PIN in a secure place, like a password-manager.

login.title: Login
login.description_passphrase: Enter your email and passphrase below to access your account.

success.title: E-Mail address confirmed!
success.description: Now you just need to setup a passkey.

error.title: Verification failed
error.description: The magic link you’ve tried is incorrect or outdated

resend.title: Resend Verification E-Mail
resend.description: Enter your e-mail address to get the verification link again.

empty.title: No tenants yet
empty.description: Create a site for someone to start collecting appointments.

add.title: Add Tenant
add.description: Create a site for someone to start collecting appointments.

name.description: Must be unique on this server. Cannot be changed. Used as a subdomain {domain}

errors.urlFormat: Only letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed
errors.startEndDash: Must not start or end with a dash

email.description: This person will receive a magic link to set up their account.

errors.nameTaken: Could not add tenant. This name is already taken.
errors.emailTaken: Could not add tenant. This E-Mail Address is already in use.
errors.startEndDash: Cannot start or end with a dash

empty.title: No tenants yet
empty.description: Click the button above to add your first tenant.

unavailable.title: Cannot delete active tenant
unavailable.description: You cannot delete the tenant you are currently configuring. Please switch to another tenant before deleting this one.

inputCroppedImageBlob.description: Supported formats are JPG, PNG, GIF and WEBP

crop.title: Crop Image
crop.description: Use your mouse to change the selection or the buttons below to adjust the image.

setup.title: This server is ready to use

tenants.title: Setup first tenant
tenants.description: Tenants are the organizations/individuals that will collect appointments.

onboarding.title: Get ready to collect appointments
onboarding.description: Follow this step-by-step to get the best results:

settings.title: Review and save settings
settings.description: Make sure your organization's details are correct, before you add agents or channels.

agents.title: Set up your agents
agents.description: Agents let your clients choose which person, team or group they want to make an appointment with.

channels.title: Set up your first channel
channels.description: Channels are your way to collect different types of appointments

staff.title: Add & Activate Staff Members
staff.description: Make sure your team can decrypt appointment data by adding staff members. Only when the first person added has logged in, appointments can be received.

empty.title: No agents yet
empty.description: Agents are required participants in appointments.

add.title: Add Agent
add.description: Agents can be people, teams or working groups. This information is public.

description.title: Description (optinal)
description.description: Can be titles, roles or other information that will help clients to choose the right agent.

empty.title: No agents yet
empty.description: Agents are required participants in appointments.

empty.title: No channels yet
empty.description: Channels are your way to collect different types of appointments

add.title: Add Channel
add.description: Channels are your way to collect different types of appointments

agents.title: Agents
agents.description: Add agents and we will manage the calendar and availability of your agents.

requiresConfirmation.title: Requires Confirmation
requiresConfirmation.label: Appointments will have to be manually confirmed by staff

slotTemplates.title: Schedule
slotTemplates.description: Slots for appointments will be created based on your schedule.

empty.title: No channels yet
empty.description: Channels are your way to collect different types of appointments

delete.title: Delete Channel
delete.description: Consider deactivating the channel instead of deleting it. Type {name} to confirm.

pause.title: Deactivate Channel
pause.description: Deactivating {name} will prevent clients from booking new appointments in this channel.

unpause.title: Activate Channel
unpause.description: Activating {name} will allow clients to book new appointments in this channel.

descriptions.500: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
descriptions.404: The page you are looking for does not exist.

add.title: Add Absence
add.description: Absences are a way to mark you agents as being unavailbale.
add.hint: Clients are not being informed. Already booked appointments have to be canceled manually.

unavailable.title: No agents available
unavailable.description: You need to add at least one agent before you can add absences.

empty.title: No future absences
empty.description: Absences are a way to mark you agents as being unavailbale.

delete.title: Delete Absence
delete.description: {name} will be available for appointments from {startDate} to {endDate}.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Define the languages your customers will see. You need to select at least one.

defaultLanguage.title: Default Language
defaultLanguage.description: This is the language your clients will see, if you don't support their language. Often times this should be English.

errors.notInLanguages: Default language must be one of the selected languages

descriptions.title: Description (optional)
descriptions.description: Short description of your organization. Will be shown on the home page.

additionalAddressInfo.title: Additional Address Info (optional)
additionalAddressInfo.description: Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.

website.title: Website (optional)
website.description: Will be shown on the home page.

imprint.title: Imprint URL (optional)
imprint.description: Will be linked in the footer.

privacyStatement.title: Privacy Statement URL (optional)
privacyStatement.description: Will be linked in the footer.

autoDeleteDays.title: Delete appointments
autoDeleteDays.description: Automatically delete appointments details after a certain period of time.

requirePhone.title: Require Phone Number
requirePhone.label: Require clients to provide a phone number when booking an appointment.

passkeys.title: Manage Passkeys
passkeys.description: You can add up to three passkeys.

change-passphrase.title: Change Passphrase
change-passphrase.description: Global Admins can set strong passphrases as a backup login method.

language.title: Language
language.description: Will be used in the invitation e-mail.

add.title: Add Member
add.description: Staff members manage your appointments and settings. They are not public.

empty.title: No staff members yet
empty.description: Staff members manage your appointments and settings

delete.title: Remove Member
delete.description: Type {email} to remove this member. This step cannot be undone.

access.title: Grant access to appointments
access.description: Do you want to grant {name} access to all client data?
access.error: Granting access to all clients failed. You can retry anytime.

unavailable.title: You can't grant access
unavailable.description: Only Appointment Managers and Tenant Admins can be granted access to client data.

tenantNotReady.title: Not ready to accept appointments.
tenantNotReady.description: If this is yours, please login and complete onboarding.

channel.title: Please select an appointment type:
channel.empty: Currently we don't have available appointments. Please check again later.

agent.title: Please select who you want your appointment with:

anyone.title: No preference
anyone.description: Choose this option to get the fastest appointment.

slot.title: Please select an available appointment:
slot.empty: No appointments available. Please select another date.

alert.title: Your data is safe
alert.description: Only you and {name} will be able to access this information. It is end-to-end encrypted.

email.description: We will use this to send you the appointment details.

phone.description: Format: +1234567890. {name} may contact you by phone, if there are questions or changes regarding your appointment.

register.title: It's my first time here
register.description: Please add an PIN number so you can change your appointment later.
register.error: Failed to create account. Please try again.
register.alreadyExists: This email is already registered. Please use the login option to book additional appointments.

login.title: Login
login.description: Please enter the PIN number, you've set:
login.throttled: Too many failed attempts. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.

summary.title: Please review your appointment, before confirming.

request.hint: This appointment will have to be manually confirmed. You will receive an E-Mail once it's confirmed.

book.title: Appointment booked
book.description: We’ve sent you an e-mail with the details.

request.title: Appointment requested
request.description: {name} will confirm or deny your request soon. You will be informed via e-mail.

register.error: Encryption could not be set up. Please retry

calendar.decryptingError: Unable to decrypt data. Please log-in again

appointmentBooked.subject: {channel} at {tenant} booked successfully
appointmentBooked.introduction: your appointment for has been booked.
appointmentBooked.reason: You are receiving this email because someone booked an appointment with your e-mail address.

appointmentReminder.subject: Reminder: Your appointment with {tenant}
appointmentReminder.reason: You are receiving this email because someone booked an appointment with your e-mail address.

appointmentRejected.subject: Your request for {channel} at {tenant} was rejected
appointmentRejected.reason: You are receiving this email because someone requested an appointment with your e-mail address.

appointmentRequest.subject: {channel} with {tenant} requested
appointmentRequest.introduction: your appointment was requested. You will be notified once it is confirmed.
appointmentRequest.reason: You are receiving this email because someone requested an appointment with your e-mail address.

confirmation.subject: Confirm your E-Mail Address
confirmation.introduction: welcome our appointment booking platform. Please confirm your e-mail address.
confirmation.hint: This link is only valid for {expirationMinutes} minutes and can only be used once.
confirmation.reason: You are receiving this email because someone registered an account with your e-mail address.

pinReset.subject: PIN successfully changed
pinReset.introduction: you've successfully changed your PIN on the {tenant} appointment booking platform. You can now log-in with your new PIN.
pinReset.reason: You are receiving this email because someone changed the PIN-Code for your account.

userInvite.subject: Confirm your E-Mail Address
userInvite.introduction: welcome our appointment booking platform. Please confirm your e-mail address.
userInvite.hint: This link is only valid for {expirationMinutes} minutes and can only be used once.
userInvite.reason: You are receiving this email because someone registered an account with your e-mail address.
